name: squash!
description:
in squash, you take the form of a bird who can transform into an anvil and smash through enemies and obstacles. you explore an underground cavern, collecting gems and avoiding dangers. while transformed as an anvil, you are protected from enemies. you can let them pass right by as you time a counterattack, or make a peaceful getaway.

i made this game in ~30 hours spread out over a couple of weeks. i wanted to relearn unity and force myself to see a project through to completion.

CREDITS FOR THE ART ASSETS
